directions: Combine all ingredients in small saucepan. Bring to a gentle boil, stirring until thoroughly combined. Use as a sauce for sliced ham (also good with pork chops or pork tenderloin).
This is also excellent as a glaze. Just spoon over entire ham about 30 minutes before ham is done, basting two or three times.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Maille® Old Style or Dijon Originale Mustard
title: Ham with Maille® Orange Sauce
